Data.Title: Orders
Data.Description: all orders can be found and order related chapters like orchestration, return reasons and logs

Data.Title: Promotions
Data.Description: all promotions are created, edited and viewed here as well as templates and campaigns for promotions

Data.Title: Financials
Data.Description: everything related to financials like invoices, currencies, tax management and other related topics

Data.Title: Tasks
Data.Description: ship from store, incoming shipments, reservations and print tasks

Data.Title: Organizations
Data.Description: all organizaiton related topics f.e. organizations, companies, opening hours

Data.Title: Settings
Data.Description: all settings and appsettings can be viewed and edited here

Data.Title: Stock
Data.Description: in this module the stock related chapters are included like stock counts, assortments and replenishment

Data.Title: People
Data.Description: employees and their roles and rights can be viewed, edited, created and deleted in this module

Data.Title: PIM
Data.Description: product bundles can be viewed, edited, deleted and created here

Data.Title: Control room
Data.Description: monitor and settings can be viewed, edited and created in this module

Data.Title: Compliance
Data.Description: Module for viewing and managing fiscal archives, event ledger, payment settlements and other, compliance-related items
